techmeme.title: Statsig, which offers a cloud tool for companies to streamline A/B testing of apps and websites, raised a $100M Series C led by Iconiq at a $1.1B valuation (Todd Bishop/GeekWire)
Filing: Uber acquires an 85% stake in Turkish food delivery platform Trendyol GO for ~$700M cash, set to close in H2 2025; Trendyol GO had 200M+ orders in 2024 (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
Q&A with Tim Sweeney on the recent Epic v. Apple ruling, bringing Fortnite back to iOS via Epic's Swedish developer account, and spending $100M+ on legal fees (Peter Kafka/Business Insider)
Amazon updates its iOS Kindle app to add a prominent orange "Get book" button, enabling purchases via the mobile browser, after the recent Epic v. Apple ruling (Andrew Liszewski/The Verge)
Spotify debuts a "plays" metric for podcasts that shows users and creators how many times people have actively listened to or watched an audio or video episode (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
